resources.string: Susrut Herbs is a one stop shop for all authentic herbs and spices and herbal Ayurvedic preparations available in Kerala. Kerala is known for its biodiversity of herbs and spices the world over. Our shop provides almost all such available herbs and spices at a reasonable price. Our products are completely organic and are collected by tribals belonging to registered tribal societies who are custodians of generations of authentic knowledge in traditional medicines. The testimony to our service lies in the fact that we have been successfully catering to the demands of people from all over the world for over 30 years.
Business Hours are 9.00 a.m. to 9.00 p.m. on weekdays. Sundays Closed.
